name: avalynx-loader
title: AvalynxLoader
description: AvalynxLoader is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to provide a loading overlay for DOM elements. Based on Bootstrap >=5.3 without any framework dependencies.

author.name: Juergen Schwind an the AvalynxLoader authors

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist; shx mkdir -p dist/js/; shx cp src/js/avalynx-loader.js dist/js/avalynx-loader.js; shx cp src/js/avalynx-loader.js dist/js/avalynx-loader.esm.js; node build.js dist/js/avalynx-loader.esm.js
